product_name: Deuter Futura Vario Pro 50 + 10 Pack - Men's
long_description: The Deuter Futura Vario Pro 50 + 10 Pack gets you out for multi-day hikes with an advanced suspension that offers lightweight, breathable comfort and a pivoting hipbelt for flexibility.
short_description: The Deuter Futura Vario Pro 50 + 10 Pack gets you out for multi-day hikes with an advanced suspension that offers lightweight, breathable comfort and a pivoting hipbelt for flexibility.
